test.name: Make a simple REST API call

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=my_github_session, url=https://api.github.Comment, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.doc: Send a GET request on the session object found using the given `alias`
